titles.title: Enhance School Safety Act

To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to allow local educational agencies to use certain grant funds provided through the Student Support and Academic Enrichment Program for school security measures, and for other purposes.
Enhance School Safety Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Enhance School Safety Act
This bill authorizes local educational agencies to use grant funds provided through the Student Support and Academic Enrichment Program for the purchase and use of school security measures, including security cameras and metal detectors.
